pages.text: Luna loves to keep the Earth clean. Every Saturday, she grabs her recycling bag and goes to the park.
She finds a plastic bottle on the ground. 'This should be in the recycling bin!' she says.
Luna puts the bottle in the right bin and smiles. She knows she's helping the planet.
The next week, Luna teaches her friends how to recycle too. Together, they make a big difference!
Timmy the turtle is brushing his teeth. He notices the water is still running.
'I should turn off the tap while I brush,' he thinks. Click! The water stops.
Timmy tells his brother: 'Letâ€™s save water every day!'
That night, they dream of a cleaner, happier ocean.
